feature: Cost Prediction Dashboard - 7-Day GPU Spot Pricing Forecasts
workflow_rationale: This is a new capability adding ML-powered 7-day cost forecasting, optimal timing recommendations, budget alerts, and calendar integration. Not a refactor, bugfix, or investigation - it's net-new functionality built on top of existing PricePredictionService infrastructure.

phases.name: ML Service Extension
phases.description: Extend PricePredictionService to support 7-day cost forecasting with confidence intervals

verification.command: python -c "from src.services.price_prediction_service import PricePredictionService; svc = PricePredictionService(); print('forecast_costs_7day' in dir(svc))"

subtasks.notes: Added forecast_costs_7day() method with ML-based and simple fallback implementations. Includes 7-day forecasting with hourly predictions, daily cost aggregation, and confidence intervals using RandomForest tree estimators. Verification passed.

subtasks.description: Add database model for storing 7-day forecasts

verification.command: python -c "from src.models.metrics import CostForecast; print('CostForecast' in dir())"

subtasks.notes: Added CostForecast model to src/models/metrics.py with: hourly_prices (JSONB for 168 hours), daily_costs, confidence_intervals, total_forecasted_cost, model metadata, usage patterns, best window fields, and appropriate indexes. Verification passed.

subtasks.description: Add accuracy tracking model and MAPE calculation

verification.command: python -c "from src.services.price_prediction_service import PricePredictionService; svc = PricePredictionService(); print('calculate_mape' in dir(svc))"

subtasks.notes: Added PredictionAccuracy model to metrics.py with MAPE, MAE, RMSE, R² metrics and JSONB fields for hourly/daily accuracy. Added calculate_mape method to PricePredictionService that compares predictions with actuals and calculates accuracy metrics. Also added helper methods _calculate_r_squared, _save_accuracy_result, and get_accuracy_history. Verification passed: calculate_mape is in dir(svc).

phases.name: Cost Forecast API Endpoints
phases.description: Create FastAPI endpoints for cost forecasting, optimal timing, and budget alerts

subtasks.notes: Created cost_forecast.py endpoint file with GET /cost-forecast/{gpu_name} route. Also created supporting schema file cost_forecast.py with CostForecastResponse, DailyCostForecastItem, and HourlyPredictionItem models. Endpoint uses PricePredictionService.forecast_costs_7day() for ML-based 7-day forecasting with confidence intervals. Verified imports work correctly.

Created POST /optimal-timing endpoint in cost_forecast.py. The endpoint:
- Accepts gpu_name, job_duration_hours, and machine_type via OptimalTimingRequest
- Uses PricePredictionService.forecast_costs_7day() to get 7-day hourly price forecasts
- Calculates all possible sliding time windows for the specified job duration
- Returns top 3 time windows sorted by lowest cost via OptimalTimingResponse
- Includes cost savings vs worst time, savings percentage, confidence, and recommendations
- Added Pydantic schemas: OptimalTimingRequest, TimeWindowItem, OptimalTimingResponse

Note: API endpoint verification requires subtask-2-4 (router registration) to be completed first. Import verification passed: routes include '/cost-forecast/{gpu_name}' and '/optimal-timing'.

Created GET /forecast-accuracy/{gpu_name} endpoint in cost_forecast.py. The endpoint:
- Uses PricePredictionService.calculate_mape() to compute accuracy metrics
- Returns MAPE, MAE, RMSE, R² and detailed hourly/daily accuracy breakdowns
- Accepts machine_type (default: interruptible) and days (1-90, default: 30) query params
- Added ForecastAccuracyResponse, HourlyAccuracyItem, DailyAccuracyItem schemas

Import verification passed: '/forecast-accuracy/{gpu_name}' route is registered in cost_forecast router.
Note: Full API verification requires subtask-2-4 (router registration in spot endpoints).
